name: staminal
description: Game Sarver-Client Engine entirely based on Mods
author: MagiusCHE

scripts.server:debug: (pkill stam_server -9 || true) && cd apps/stam_server && STAM_HOME="./workspace_data" cargo run --bin stam_server -- --config workspace_data/configs/develop.json --log-file
scripts.client:debug: (pkill stam_client -9 || true) && cd apps/stam_client && STAM_URI="stam://magius:324fd324@localhost:9999" STAM_LANG="it-IT" STAM_HOME="./workspace_data" cargo run --bin stam_client -- --log-file
